title: Understanding Hybridization
text: Consider the number of sigma bonds and lone pairs around the highlighted carbon atom. This will help determine its hybridization.

title: Counting Sigma Bonds
text: The highlighted carbon atom is bonded to three hydrogen atoms and one nitrogen atom. How many sigma bonds does it have?

title: Determining Hybridization
text: Based on the number of sigma bonds and lone pairs, what is the hybridization of the highlighted carbon atom?
